required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Distribution and Prognostic Impact of Oncogenic Drivers in Metastatic Lung Adenocarcinoma : a Retrospective Monocentric Study in Nancy University Hospital Center
clinical_study.official_title: Distribution and Prognostic Impact of Oncogenic Drivers in Metastatic Lung Adenocarcinoma : a Retrospective Monocentric Study in Nancy University Hospital Center

brief_summary.textblock: The recent discovery of oncogenic drivers has revolutionized the management of advanced lung cancer by development of tyrosine kinase inhibitors targeted therapies. Prevalence of daily tobacco use is evaluated at 31,3 % in Grand-Est region, the only French region with a statistically significative difference for smoking habits. This region shows a higher incidence (+ 13 %) and mortality for lung cancer in comparison to the average for other French regions. The objectives of our studie were to estimate the distribution of oncogenic drivers and analyse their prognostic impacts in the Nancy University Hospital Center metastatic lung adenocarcinoma's population.

primary_outcome.time_frame: over a period of 5 years (Day 0 = anatomopathological diagnosis)
primary_outcome.description: Time (in months) from anatomopathological diagnosis to death

primary_outcome.time_frame: over a period of 5 years (Day 0 = anatomopathological diagnosis)
primary_outcome.description: Time (in months) from anatomopathological diagnosis to progression of the disease assessed by RECIST criteria

primary_outcome.measure: Distribution in percentage of main oncogenic drivers in histological samples from metastatic lung adenocarcinoma
primary_outcome.description: Distribution in percentage of main oncogenic drivers (KRAS, EGFR, ALK, ROS-1, BRAS and HER2), assessed by Sanger sequencing or FISH method in histological samples from metastatic lung adenocarcinomas

secondary_outcome.measure: Distribution in percentage of metastasis sites according oncogenic drivers
secondary_outcome.description: Distribution in percentage of metastatic sites assessed by CT-scan for metastatic lung adenocarcinomas according oncogenic drivers (KRAS, EGFR, ALK, ROS-1, BRAS and HER2)

clinical_study.condition: Adenocarcinoma of Lung, Response to Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor in, Somatic

study_pop.textblock: Patients with metastatic lung adenocarcinoma diagnosed between 2012 and 2014 with a medical follow-up entirely done in Nancy Central Hospital

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Lung adenocarcinoma
- Patients diagnosed at a metastatic stage
- Patient who benefited an oncogenic driver research on their histologic samples
- Medical follow-up entirely done in Nancy Central Hospital
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with double histology
- Synchronous cancer
- Patients with surgical care
